content:
{"name": "Salvation Army Bridgeton", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Diaper distribution require you to call ahead before to make an appointment and provide birth certificates.
- Serves Bridgeton residents only.
- One can also use the following link to sign up and book an appointment.(https://www.facebook.com/NJSABridgeton)
- They also offfer fresh groceries giveaways on wednesday mornings from 10:30 which is on on a first come first serve basis and has no requirements.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/NJSABridgeton", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "29 West Commerce Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Bridgeton", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08302", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.4295073, "longitude": -75.2364127}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 451-0999", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
